answers.answer: I m too diagnosed with it....just week back ...I am 29 almost 30 now....my dr recommended me diet for 1week but don't work...and yesterday thy put me on insulin....I was taking utmost care of preg but still....my baby also diagnosed with vsd..its a hole in heart...I am in complete shock and tensed since then....I am very scared for my baby

question: Hi Ive just been diagnosed with gdm usually pretty fit and eat well so when I got the news it came as a shock. none the less im 30wks and trying to manage my condition as best I can with regular excersie and eating right. Jas anyone else experienced this and if so what helped you manage, did you have any challenges with birth??Any feedback would be appreciated.
title: gestational diabetes
